item.title: Multicast Delegate and Delegates Composition
item.description: The delegate pattern is familiar to most iOS developers, and is used heavily by Apple to achieve object composition without inheritance. In this post, Vadim Bulavin looks at a variation of this pattern, which he calls multicast delegation. Vadim provides Swift code example throughout to aid understanding.
